extension.description: Visual Studio Code debugger extension for Node.js
bazis.label: Bazis
smartStep.description: Automatically step through generated code that cannot be mapped back to the original source.
skipFiles.description: An array of glob patterns for files to skip when debugging.
outFiles.description: If source maps are enabled, these glob patterns specify the generated JavaScript files. If a pattern starts with '!' the files are excluded. If not specified, the generated code is expected in the same directory as its source.
launch.args.description: Command line arguments passed to the program.
bazis.sourceMaps.description: Use JavaScript source maps (if they exist).
bazis.port.description: Debug port to attach to. Default is 5858.
bazis.address.description: TCP/IP address of debug port (for Node.js >= 5.0 only). Default is 'localhost'.
bazis.timeout.description: Retry for this number of milliseconds to connect to Node.js. Default is 10000 ms.
bazis.launch.program.description: Absolute path to the program. Generated value is guessed by looking at package.json and opened files. Edit this attribute.
bazis.launch.console.description: Where to launch the debug target: internal console, integrated terminal, or external terminal.
bazis.launch.cwd.description: Absolute path to the working directory of the program being debugged.
bazis.launch.runtimeExecutable.descripti: Runtime to use. Either an absolute path or the name of a runtime available on the PATH. If ommitted 'node' is assumed.
bazis.launch.runtimeArgs.description: Optional arguments passed to the runtime executable.
bazis.launch.env.description: Environment variables passed to the program.
bazis.launch.envFile.description: Absolute path to a file containing environment variable definitions.
bazis.launch.config.name: Launch
bazis.attach.processId.description: Id of process to attach to.
bazis.attach.restart.description: Restart session after Node.js has terminated.
bazis.attach.localRoot.description: The local source root that corresponds to the 'remoteRoot'.
bazis.attach.remoteRoot.description: The source root of the remote host.
bazis.attach.config.name: Attach
bazis.processattach.config.name: Attach to Process
bazis.snippet.launch.label: Node.js: Launch Configuration
bazis.snippet.launch.description: A new configuration for launching a node program
bazis.snippet.attach.label: Node.js: Attach Configuration
bazis.snippet.attach.description: A new configuration for attaching to a running node program
extensionHost.label: VS Code Extension Development
extensionHost.launch.stopOnEntry.descrip: Automatically stop the extension host after launch.
extensionHost.launch.config.name: Launch Extension
